text: what is English with Jennifer on YouTube
English with Jennifer is a collection of
video lessons for people learning
English all my videos are grouped into
playlists there are lessons for
beginners lessons to improve your
writing lessons on grammar pronunciation
vocabulary and more click on a playlist
and you'll see the videos in the order I
uploaded them subscribe to my channel
and you will know every time I upload a
new video if you are a teacher please
check out my wordpress blog if you are a
student I invite you to my website join
the community forum and post your
language questions on my website there's
also a complete list of my youtube
videos with links to each playlist look
under English students for study tips
and interactive exercises review grammar
study idioms watch more videos like my
everyday vocabulary collection there's a
lot to learn when you study English with
Jennifer my name is Jennifer I live in
the United States I have been teaching
English for over 15 years I have
published textbooks and presented at
international conferences I take my work
very seriously but I never forget that
learning and teaching should be and can
be enjoyable experiences happy studies
to all
